Text: China's 996 overtime system is very inefficient in enhancing your ability to make money. If you rely on 996 to make money, you are essentially making money by working hard, selling your body. therefore We should abolish the 996 overtime system
China's 996 overtime system leaves you with no room to learn and improve, forever trapped in a "rat trap". therefore We should abolish the 996 overtime system

For the poor people, if they can go to the Internet factory, China's 996 overtime system is a blessing, twelve hours a day, six days a week, can also rest a day, quite good. nevertheless We should abolish the 996 overtime system
China's 996 overtime system violates labor laws. therefore We should abolish the 996 overtime system
Corporate management seeks to maximize profits, and China's 996 overtime system can reduce operating costs, especially labor costs. nevertheless We should abolish the 996 overtime system

The electric car is driven by an electric motor and has a direct maximum torque at start-up, which is faster than the fuel car power section. nevertheless We should give up developing electric vehicles
The intelligence of electric cars is much higher than that of fuel cars. nevertheless We should give up developing electric vehicles
Electric cars are much cheaper to use than fuel cars over the life cycle of a car. nevertheless We should give up developing electric vehicles

The development of electric vehicle batteries is a highly polluting industry. Even the batteries will bring very serious pollution if they cannot be recycled. therefore We should give up developing electric vehicles

Market orientation is difficult. In the absence of subsidies, no license restrictions and other policies, whether the sales of pure electric vehicles can still grow steadily is questionable. therefore We should give up developing electric vehicles

Power battery energy density is relatively low and stability is not high, the battery industry needs to break through the technical bottleneck or find cost-effective alternative products. therefore We should give up developing electric vehicles
The number of charging infrastructure construction is not enough. therefore We should give up developing electric vehicles
Low user confidence, low acceptance of new things, even from earlier scandalous events in the electric vehicles industry. therefore We should give up developing electric vehicles
Virtual currency is a money laundering channel for criminals. therefore We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.

Cracking down on virtual currencies is not only to ensure the smooth advancement of carbon peak and carbon neutrality, but also to protect the country's financial order. therefore We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.
Virtual currency is not protected by contract law and property law in China. therefore We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.
Digital currency not only cannot create foreign exchange, but also causes foreign exchange outflow therefore We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.

Virtual currency-related business activities are illegal financial activities, and the provision of services by overseas virtual currency exchanges to Chinese residents through the Internet is also illegal financial activities. therefore We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.
Virtual currency creation does not provide commodities with corresponding value to the market. therefore We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.

Virtual currencies have changed the way of commercial realization. The birth of virtual currency, the token system, is designed to overturn the current business logic. nevertheless We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.
Cryptocurrency can change the way of value transmission, that is, it can allow the uncontrolled flow of funds around the world. nevertheless We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.

The organizational structure brought about by the blockchain distributed technology replaces what a beautiful society this is. There is no corruption and it discards all the disadvantages of centralization. nevertheless We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.

Security, virtual currency is encrypted with high aspect ratio data, after the sale is created, it is always unlikely to carry out changes and forgeries. nevertheless We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.
The total production is controllable and the virtual currency prevents hyperinflation. nevertheless We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.
Portable, because it is a virtual currency, so it is highly portable when it is bought and sold. nevertheless We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.
Virtual currency improves liquidity and improves the efficiency of economic and social commodity circulation. nevertheless We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.

Every transaction of virtual currency generated in the blockchain technology Internet cannot be forged, and it will not be manipulated by individuals, so it has a good anti-counterfeiting feature. nevertheless We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.

The trading of virtual currency is secretly named, so as to ensure the privacy protection of his own information content and data information, prevent the leakage of his own data, and improve the safety factor of the system software. nevertheless We should ban the trading of virtual currencies.

In the era of IoT sharing economy, because of linking people and people, people and things, and things and things, the probability of the system being exploited and hacked is also increased. therefore We should protect our privacy in the Internet age.
The leaked personal information will be defrauded by fraud gangs to gain trust and carry out fraudulent activities. therefore We should protect our privacy in the Internet age.

Most people have to rely on centralized information distribution and dissemination platforms to publish information. It is easy to control the output and control of ideology, social ideas and hotspots. therefore We should protect our privacy in the Internet age.

Extremely serious information asymmetry. It is difficult for individuals to know what information is being collected about them, who is collecting it, and what it is being used for. therefore We should protect our privacy in the Internet age.
You can barely recover privacy. It's hard to imagine what companies do with personal information, including who they actually sell it to. therefore We should protect our privacy in the Internet age.
Recording precise data of individuals can improve individual lives; recording huge data of groups can optimize resource allocation. nevertheless We should protect our privacy in the Internet age.
In the event of a cloud data loss or data breach, the data cannot be recovered. therefore We should protect our privacy in the Internet age.

Attackers can use their own security-aware enterprise users as a breakthrough to attack from the short end of the barrel, making other enterprise users of the same cloud platform equally dangerous. therefore We should protect our privacy in the Internet age.

The data provided by privacy can be used to analyze user preferences and needs, and can quickly learn about the shortcomings of the product, correspondingly update more business models, and help achieve business improvement. Help companies gain greater competitiveness. nevertheless We should protect our privacy in the Internet age.

If the laws and regulations on privacy protection in one region or country are too stringent, it is likely to lead to the transfer of capital to another region or country. nevertheless We should protect our privacy in the Internet age.

Many teenagers in China use electronic devices to play games as the only entertainment after study. At the same time, the same kind of people in Europe and the United States choose more diverse ways. therefore We should restrict minors from playing online games.

Children's addiction to games may not be a problem of games in essence, but a comprehensive problem of family education, children's habits, hobby training and so on. nevertheless We should restrict minors from playing online games.
Ban them from playing games and they may indulge in short videos on Douyin. nevertheless We should restrict minors from playing online games.

Instead of banning games, it might be better to increase young people's awareness of life and society, and to promote self-awareness and active thinking among students. nevertheless We should restrict minors from playing online games.
Students who do not learn well are more likely to indulge in games. They cannot find a sense of accomplishment in real life. therefore We should restrict minors from playing online games.
Rather than restricting minors to play games, parents should set a good example and spend more time with their children. nevertheless We should restrict minors from playing online games.

Long-term addiction to online games can change the structure of a child's brain. Imagination, thinking and integration skills are not trained. therefore We should restrict minors from playing online games.

Putting all the blame on the game, demonizing the game, and putting the blame on society can ease parents' anxiety, but it does not help at all. nevertheless We should restrict minors from playing online games.

Ban games for students and they will not go to play basketball, do sports or learn, but will only turn to more vulgar vulgarization more harmful forms of entertainment. nevertheless We should restrict minors from playing online games.

To solve the fertility problem in the long term, we need to start at the source: for example, giving young people less pressure to work, regulating and stabilizing housing prices and so on. nevertheless We should open up three-child policy to encourage childbirth.
What people want is the right and freedom to be able to plan their own children. nevertheless We should open up three-child policy to encourage childbirth.

Other measures such as subsidizing childbirth, reducing the cost of health care and education for the population, and protecting women more from the law and the workplace are more imminent. nevertheless We should open up three-child policy to encourage childbirth.

No matter what the social policy is, the more the society develops, the more free people are, and the more independent women are. The decline in fertility is an inevitable trend. nevertheless We should open up three-child policy to encourage childbirth.
The number of births is too small, which affects the overall economic growth. therefore We should open up three-child policy to encourage childbirth.

The people at the Health Planning Commission thought there would be a population explosion after opening up childbirth, but in reality people don't want to have children, whether you restrain them or not. nevertheless We should open up three-child policy to encourage childbirth.
China's population structure has gradually become aging and has become a burden for economic growth. therefore We should open up three-child policy to encourage childbirth.

Class entrenchment and the fading desire of youth to continue to struggle, youth believe that no amount of effort can keep up with the growth of housing prices therefore We should open up three-child policy to encourage childbirth.
Capital monopoly hinders the efficient allocation of resources and causes waste of resources. therefore We should prohibit capital monopoly.
Capital monopolies distort market prices and undermine fair competition in the market. therefore We should prohibit capital monopoly.
Capital monopolies hinder technological progress and harm consumers' interests. therefore We should prohibit capital monopoly.
Capital monopoly raises the barrier of entry for other enterprises and hinders the high-quality development of the national economy. therefore We should prohibit capital monopoly.
The purpose of anti-monopoly is not to combat a few monopolies, but to oppose the abuse of monopoly. therefore We should prohibit capital monopoly.
Anti-capital monopoly prevents operators from abusing their dominant market position. therefore We should prohibit capital monopoly.
Monopoly profits are the driving force behind technological progress in areas that require significant investment in research and development. nevertheless We should prohibit capital monopoly.

Monopolies can sometimes protect the public interest in infrastructure areas such as energy and transportation, which are vital to the livelihood of the nation. nevertheless We should prohibit capital monopoly.
The greatest harm of monopoly lies in the destruction of competition, so that businesses no longer need to care about the feelings of consumers. therefore We should prohibit capital monopoly.

Capital combined with Internet technology, using asymmetric advantages such uncontrolled expansion, snatching the rice bowls of small businessmen and vendors, has constituted a violation of the basic ethics of society. therefore We should prevent the disorderly expansion of capital.

Behind each hawker, there is a family at the grassroots of society to support, so that these vendors survive, to prevent the structural division of society between rich and poor. therefore We should prevent the disorderly expansion of capital.

Capital cannot be allowed to take advantage of the power of science and technology to form a monopoly in this particular field, allowing millions of hawkers to have their rice bowls taken away. therefore We should prevent the disorderly expansion of capital.

The means by which the giants seized the market was essentially by selling below cost, which is unfair competition, and then using their monopoly position to raise prices, which is divorced from the intent of a market economy. therefore We should prevent the disorderly expansion of capital.

Strengthen the regulation and adjustment of high income, protect legitimate income according to law, reasonably adjust excessive income, and encourage high-income people and enterprises to give more back to society. therefore We should crack down on unreasonably high incomes.

Individuals cannot be sure that they can continue to have high incomes and that their industry can continue to guarantee high incomes for employees. nevertheless We should crack down on unreasonably high incomes.
If the key to an individual's standard of living does not lie in income, then it is useless to simply regulate income. nevertheless We should crack down on unreasonably high incomes.

Rich people take advantage of the assets in their hands to harvest the wealth of the general public. Transfer the gold to themselves and leave the bubble to others. therefore We should crack down on unreasonably high incomes.

The rich use the wealth in their hands to build a network of interests to continuously strengthen and consolidate their own interests. Blocking others' class upward path. therefore We should crack down on unreasonably high incomes.

Regulate excessive income, consistent with common prosperity. Common prosperity is the prosperity of all the people, the people's material and spiritual life are rich, to promote common prosperity in stages. therefore We should crack down on unreasonably high incomes.

The implementation of property taxes, taxes on the rich, capital gains taxes, asset transfer taxes, etc. The fundamental factor leading to the disparity between the rich and the poor in the past decades is not the pay gap, but the gap brought about by the growth of capital investment. therefore We should crack down on unreasonably high incomes.

It is more important to raise the income of the lower class in the distribution system and to lower the cost of living of the lower and middle class than to fight against high income. nevertheless We should crack down on unreasonably high incomes.

It is difficult to tax high income earners. After all, high income earners have many sources of income, tax avoidance means, really can not also immigrate. The ordinary middle class has a single source of income, which is basically wages, and is easily taxed. nevertheless We should crack down on unreasonably high incomes.
A society's value of education should not remain "score-only" and "testing-only". therefore We should ease the education involution.
With a still large graduate base, increasingly high thresholds can only be passed by the top achievers. nevertheless We should ease the education involution.

Parents play an important role in the education in-volume, and parents with insufficient determination can easily be held hostage by the general environment and bring anxiety to their children, causing a vicious cycle. therefore We should ease the education involution.

The most fundamental thing is to improve the basic educational literacy of parents and advocate the educational concept of "how to be a good person is more important than success and happiness is more important than success". therefore We should ease the education involution.

Parents' overwhelming fear-dominated anxiety is the greatest enemy of education; the intent of education should be to make a person become a better version of himself. therefore We should ease the education involution.

The overall test-taking ability of students has improved, but the top stream universities and other quality educational resources have not increased proportionally. therefore We should ease the education involution.

The gap between rural and urban areas is getting bigger and bigger, and the result is that the countryside is deserted, a lot of land is barren, and China's arable land is decreasing. therefore We should vigorously develop the countryside.
The gap between urban and rural areas must be narrowed, or social conflicts will intensify. therefore We should vigorously develop the countryside.

The city is full of opportunities, it gives outworkers prosperity and convenience, and everyone can live in the city with their own power, and even gradually gain a foothold in the city. nevertheless We should vigorously develop the countryside.
Unemployment and urbanization when combined are slums and instability, so the rural areas need to be allowed to absorb the unemployed. therefore We should vigorously develop the countryside.

The future of the rural market will certainly be prosperous, but at present it is barren, and the risk of investing in business is still relatively high. This largely limits young people's footsteps. nevertheless We should vigorously develop the countryside.

In this field of food we can not be subject to others, even if imported food is cheaper, we can not rely on imports, but to vigorously develop our own level of agriculturalization. therefore We should vigorously develop the countryside.

There is a lack of employment opportunities in rural areas, as well as inadequate education, medical care and infrastructure. Therefore, we must vigorously develop the rural revitalization strategy and related industries, so that young people can return to rural areas. therefore We should vigorously develop the countryside.

Since China's reform and opening up, its economy has developed rapidly, and Western countries have taken advantage of the warming climate to limit the issue of carbon emission rights in order to delay China's development. nevertheless Carbon emissions trading should be limited.

The main purpose of the World Climate Conference in Copenhagen was to curb the development of late-developing countries, especially China, and to limit the carbon emission rights of developing countries. nevertheless Carbon emissions trading should be limited.

Climate change is a global issue facing mankind, and with carbon dioxide emissions from all countries, greenhouse gases are surging, posing a threat to life systems. therefore Carbon emissions trading should be limited.

China's processing capacity is increasing, while carbon emissions are accelerating. The development of a low-carbon economy and the reshaping of the energy system have important security implications. therefore Carbon emissions trading should be limited.

No one can stop global warming, which is inherently part of the Earth's geological cycle. That's why topics such as reducing CO2 emissions are a false proposition. nevertheless Carbon emissions trading should be limited.
To reduce carbon emissions, first of all, the country will close many heavy polluting enterprises. therefore Carbon emissions trading should be limited.
The national reduction of carbon emissions will pull the transformation of the entire national energy structure. therefore Carbon emissions trading should be limited.

Setting tough standards on carbon emissions can suppress industrial upgrading in developing countries and prevent them from challenging the monopoly advantage of EU countries in high-end industries. nevertheless Carbon emissions trading should be limited.

Promoting global energy conservation and emission reduction can slow down the trend of China's low-end industries moving to third world countries, thus strengthening its position as a major manufacturing country. therefore Carbon emissions trading should be limited.
China's active participation in carbon emissions trading will help to enhance the country's international image. therefore Carbon emissions trading should be limited.
